trans-unit.source: Defines a filter expression for the table query.
trans-unit.target: Defines a filter expression for the table query.

trans-unit.source: Only entities that satisfy the specified filter expression will be returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: Only entities that satisfy the specified filter expression will be returned by the query.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the filter expression to apply to the table query.
trans-unit.target: A string containing the filter expression to apply to the table query.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> instance set with the filter on entities to return.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> instance set with the filter on entities to return.

trans-unit.source: Setting a filter expression is optional; by default, all entities in the table are returned if no filter expression is specified in the table query.
trans-unit.target: Setting a filter expression is optional; by default, all entities in the table are returned if no filter expression is specified in the table query.
